CHAT.comment: Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

context notes say that Mot and Chi sit down close to each other at the dining room table to read. Chi is a very good reader , and she and Mot interact very affectionately; Mot asked a question to help Chi read (what would you have after eating all that) , and also mouths some of the words as Chi reads
